inclusion.criterion: newly diagnosed patients with operable breast cancer regardless of whether lymph nodes are suspicious or not.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who had previously undergone axillary surgery.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with metastatic disease and not planned for axillary surgery.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a preoperative diagnosis of a benign lesion or ductal carcinoma in situ.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with severe uncorrectable bleeding diathesis.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative.
